channel.title: Pk Point Exchange
channel.description:
Hi, I have the Pk system worked out. Like if you kill someone it will give you Pk Points.. But I wanna make a Pk shop.. For example, theres gonna be a AGS and lets say I wanna put it for exchange for 30k Pk Points. What will I do? Like I want it to be exchanged for 30k Pk Points.. Not 30k coins. Oh and I also want the Pk Points to be shown besides the combat level.
Oh and I'm using Delta as a base. Thanks for you time. I appreciate it :)!

item.title: Pk Point Exchange
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

Hi, I have the Pk system worked out. Like if you kill someone it will give you Pk Points… But I wanna make a Pk shop… For example, theres gonna be a AGS and lets say I wanna put it for exchange for 30k Pk Points. What will I do? Like I want it to be exchanged for 30k Pk Points… Not 30k coins. Oh and I also want the Pk Points to be shown besides the combat level.

Oh and I’m using Delta as a base. Thanks for you time. I appreciate it :)!
